name: Orange Onion Salad
keywords: raw, red onion, romaine, seedless orange
recipeIngredient: 4 heads romaine or red leaf lettuce or other salad greens
4 navel oranges, peeled and sliced into rounds 3 or 4 very thin slices

recipeInstructions.text: Wash and dry leaves; tear into bite-size pieces and arrange on each of 4 plates.
Arrange orange slices on leaves and slip onion rings in between orange slices.
Whisk vinegar and oil together and pour over salads.
